name: Hotel Delle Vittorie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised with the Hotel Delle Vittorie, considering the amount we payed to stay it exceeded all of our expectations. The rooms were very clean and tidy upon arrival and throughout the stay, and were very large! The marble bathroom was to a high standard and also of an impressive size. It is also conveniently placed in an area which feels safe and up market at all times (which can not be said of some of the other hotels around the Termini area!). Overall I would recommend the hotel and we will head straight there next time we go to Rome.
reviews.title: Excellent stay!

reviews.text: Just returned from a few days in room with the Mrs.
reviews.title: As expected, value for money.

reviews.text: The hotel was as I expected really. It didnt cost much as we were on a budget so I didn't really expect much. Lets be honest, if you've come to room then all you want to do is get out and see the sites. You only need somewhere to rest your head.
reviews.title: Very much priceworth.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was about a 30min walk to the main area with the attractions which is fine unless its raining constantly for the entire time you are out there like with us!
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.text: There is a bus just round the corner though and the Metro is a 10 min walk.
reviews.title: Great Hotel for exploring Rome

reviews.text: Recently spent 3 nights here. Friendly helpful staff but even they could not get our air conditioning switched on! Rome's council (must charge other pricier hotels ) apparently restrict the start date. As our room was on the ground floor, just off the lobby area and next to the hotel entrance, it was impossible to leave the window open for air at night as people smoked outside front door + talked plus traffic noise! Staff noise in lobby from around 7am too. On checkout I asked for and received 10% discount (which was on top of the 7% online reduction for a stay of 3 nights) . Room was clean and nice bathroom but would advise to buy breakfast at local bar / cafe as hotel's breakfast offering was unimpressive. Wifi is provided free but for one device only(!) per room, so you may need to request a separate code, which we did and obtained as there were 2 of us! Good location away from main centre which is leisurely 5 minute walk from nearest Metro. Consider our stay was good value for money.
reviews.title: Great weather in Rome catches out Hoteliers!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had actually stayed at this hotel with my girlfriend from 2/9/13 Check out: 2/13/13 and we had booked the hotel in orbitz. Since the price for the rooms were inexpensive for Rome my expectation were not high. Once we arrived in the hotel were quite surprised by the confort and quality of the beds and the bathroom was also very nice. We had opted to have breakfast in the morning and the meal were very good. There was a problem with the amount of bread served, and the staff corrected this problem and actually gave us a discount. The location was also great, I will certainly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit Rome during anytime of the year.
reviews.title: Excellent value for your money

reviews.text: Truly speaking this is one of the best stay, it was like "Home away from Home".
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Starting from such a wonderful, cheerful & helpful staff, then housekeeping, Hospitality, location are all great. We stayed for 6 nights and stay was fantastic. We stayed for 5 nights and then after gap 2 days for another 1 night before flying back. When we came back we got the same room and our remaining luggage was available in the room. Our 2yrs daughter was even more delighted with stay and greeting from staff and nice chocolates @ 24hrs front desk. Thanks everyone at ‘Delle Vittorie’ for making our trip so great. Would love to stay with you soon.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel friendly helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dio benedica
reviews.title: Good choice of hotel, will go again

reviews.text: I stay in Rome once or twice a year, each time in a different area of the City. This time it was the Prati area and I stayed at Hotel Delle Vittorie.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel with EXCELLENT Staff

reviews.text: Myself and my traveling partners greatly apprecated the staff at this lovely hotel. While the facility is fine, it truly is the staff that made our stay so pleasant.
reviews.title: Reasonable Hotel in nice area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are large by Italy standards. The bathroom, huge! Room was clean and well taken care of during our stay. Internet worked well. No complaints.
reviews.title: Decent Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed night in a single room so this may not reflect the same as other reviewers, The room was small (not unusual in a City hotel).
reviews.title: Made my trip great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The area is quite nice, not too far from Vatican (although I was on business trip to a quite local office).
reviews.title: first timers

reviews.text: I recently returned from a 2 night trip to Rome with a group of 7.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, friendly staff, large rooms, bad bar area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was OK. It was clean, the staff were friendly and the rooms were a nice size.
reviews.title: Weekend for two, Jan 25th-26th
Ok-ish
reviews.text: I would however have spent more on a better location which we ended up spending anyway in taxis.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bed's aren't very comfortable but manageable. Decor is dated and you only get internet for 1 device.
reviews.title: Nice rooms, bad breakfast, horrible internet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Due to being in a group on both evenings we wanted to sit in the 'bar area' and all chat and have a drink. The drinks on offer were so poor - no soft drinks except large 5euro bottles of water. About 5 whiskeys, 2 gins and baileys on offer and then 2 types of beer. The only thing I like was the Baileys and after 2 glasses it had run out and apparently they had no more?!?
reviews.title: Friendly, clean, and good value for money

description: Individually controlled air conditioning, telephone and Internet access, satellite TV, radio, minibar and safe-deposit box. Each one of the 41 rooms offers all the comfort you may need.Converted from a small early 20th century aristocratic residence, the Hotel delle Vittorie is located close by the homonymous TV Theatre and near the RAI (Italian Television) offices, the courthouses, the Coni (Italian National Olympic Committee) and the Olympic Stadium. The famous Piazza di Spagna and the Vatican Museums are easy reachable by the Underground (Lepanto Station), just a few steps away from the hotel. Its strategic location, the services offered and the own internal parking make the Hotel delle Vittorie the ideal landmark for tourists and for the several needs of businessmen.
